name: Eye Ear IT
tag_list: multimedia, scan, 2d, ricj-media, eye-ear-it, text-book, print, symbology, symbol, flashlight, scannner, children, book, books, education, educational, teach, learn, language, special-needs
overview:
Eye Ear IT creates print to rich media solutions

Our technology and platform allows anything printed to transform into immersive, multisensory, interactive experiences.

Eye ear IT creates and manufactures consumer electronic devices, software and media.

We’ve launched out proprietary technology and platform in the form of The Magic Flashlight Series.

The Magic Flashlight Series is a collection of children’s book titles designed to work in tandem with our device, The Magic Flashlight. As a user directs the flashlight onto the pages of the books the books read themselves aloud, in multiple languages, the characters in the books speak with each other and the books release a wide range of sounds to expand the experience.

Next generation versions of the technology will involve web interactivity and peer-to-peer communication and interaction.

Eye Ear IT IP has a broad range of utility and we’re actively pursuing a range of verticals in addition to Children’s Books.
